name: Hi, I'm James.
body:
## Recent projects
### [NZ On Air: Irirangi Te Motu](http://nzonair.govt.nz)
To allow for the kind of flexibility in the CMS that was needed for NZ On Air content we implemented [Sir Trevor](http://madebymany.github.io/sir-trevor-js/) into our CMS. We've created all kinds of custom blocks that the site administrators can now use, I don't know how we ever did content management without it!
![NZ On Air](images/nzonair.jpg)

### [Kiwibank Home Hunter](http://homehunter.co.nz)

![Kiwibank Home Hunter](images/hh.jpg)
### [Klim](http://klim.co.nz)
